page.title: 12A FACTORY AT CHILMARK
page.content: {Salisbury Investment Castings}have a factory behind the garage,north of the main road, the B3089. The firm moved from Salisbury in{1978}because they wanted to expand. They are now finding their present premises too small. The factory employs{26 people}of whom 8 are female. Most of the{workers}come fom Tisbury by private transport , but a few travel from Salisbury and Shaftesbury. Only two workers live in Chilmark. The firm makes{small engin- {eering components}by the{Lost Wax method using an expendable wax pattern Metal is poured into the cavity formed when the wax is melted. This process has many advantages over other types of{casting. The metal used comes by road from {Sheffield.}All{transport}is by road. AMcG
